sources.title: Hoopla
sources.description: Title: Hoopla Summary: A hula dancer at a carnival sets out to seduce the son of the show's manager. Directed by: Frank Lloyd Actors: Clara Bow, Preston Foster, Richard Cromwell Production Company: Fox Film Corporation Release Date: 30 November 1933 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 A hula dancer at a carnival sets out to seduce the son of the show's manager.
